# `nomad_media_pip`

## PIP Setup Instructions

### Install PIP

LINUX:
```bash
sudo apt-get install python-pip
```

MAC:
```bash
sudo easy_install pip
```

Windows:
```bash
Download https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py
python get-pip.py
```

### Install PIP Packages

```bash
pip install nomad_media_pip
```
